comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in the Sydney Mail in December 1907, in a feature article on the 1907 Sydney Mail/Sydney Morning Herald Prize Farm Competition. The SM caption is 'Harvesting the oat crop at Woodlands'...a farm in the Gilmore Valley, south of Tumut, in southern NSW...(see the panorama on pp. 1588-1589) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=CzlVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=DZUDA... Another pic from this Sydney Mail article is also in the PHM Tyrrell Collection - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/4903867970/ Also see this pic from the PHM Tyrrell Collection, which didn't make the Sydney Mail article...it appears to have been taken at the same time. www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2532460507/ Here's another one - www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=30165&a...
